    • 方法详细资料

      • generateKeys

        protected void generateKeys​(java.lang.Object parameter)
        参数:
        parameter - 依据参数创建出KeyGenerator,
        然后用keyGenerator实例KeyGenerator.processBefore(Executor, MappedStatement, Statement, Object)

      • getBoundSql

        public BoundSql getBoundSql()
        指定者:
        getBoundSql 在接口中 StatementHandler

      • getParameterHandler

        public ParameterHandler getParameterHandler()
        指定者:
        getParameterHandler 在接口中 StatementHandler

      • prepare

        public java.sql.Statement prepare​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                  java.lang.Integer transactionTimeout)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        指定者:
        prepare 在接口中 StatementHandler
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • instantiateStatement

        protected abstract java.sql.Statement instantiateStatement​(java.sql.Connection connection)
                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        实例化Statement
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setStatementTimeout

        protected void setStatementTimeout​(java.sql.Statement stmt,
                                   java.lang.Integer transactionTimeout)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        从mappedStatement中取出查询用Timeout存入stmt
        取不出? 就从configuration中取出默认的查询用Timeout存入stmt
        参数:
        stmt - 需要被存入查询用Timeout的对象
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException
        另请参阅:
        StatementUtil.applyTransactionTimeout(Statement, Integer, Integer), Statement.setQueryTimeout(int)

      • setFetchSize

        protected void setFetchSize​(java.sql.Statement stmt)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        从mappedStatement中取出FetchSize存入stmt
        取不出? 就从configuration中取出默认的FetchSize存入stmt
        参数:
        stmt - 需要被存入FetchSize的对象
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException
        另请参阅:
        Statement.setFetchSize(int)

      • closeStatement

        protected void closeStatement​(java.sql.Statement statement)
        关闭statement, 忽略异常
        参数:
        statement - 需要被关闭的statement
